docs.snippet: Loved by some for his aggressive play and disliked by others for his celebratory style, the Dodgers’ Yasiel Puig has fascinated fans with his hitting, mental gaffes, benchings and shadowy defection from Cuba....
docs.lead_paragraph: Loved by some for his aggressive play and disliked by others for his celebratory style, the Dodgers’ Yasiel Puig has fascinated fans with his hitting, mental gaffes, benchings and shadowy defection from Cuba.
docs.abstract: Los Angeles Dodgers outfielder Yasiel Puig is one of baseball's most exciting players; some fans love the aggressive way he plays, and others dislike his celebratory, flamboyant style, but either way fans seem fascinated by him.

headline.main: Dodgers’ Puig Is Entertaining Fans and Detractors Alike
